rules_text:
When Bal's Descent enters, each player sacrifices a creature, discards two cards, and mills three cards.
{1}{B}{B}: Transform Bal's Descent. Activate only if your fealty to Swamps is five or greater.
rules_text2:
Indestructible
You may play cards from your graveyard.
If you would draw one or more cards, mill that many cards instead.
If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere other than your library, exile it instead.
notes: !append (Each Swamp you control counts towards your fealty to Swamps.)
